synopsis.text:
The anime is divided into three captivating parts. The first part, "Cure Flora and the Mischievous Mirror," is a delightful dialogue-free short featuring Cure Flora and her playful interaction with a spirited ghost residing in a mirror.

In the second part, "The Pumpkin Kingdom's Treasure," the courageous Precure girls embark on a thrilling adventure to rescue a kidnapped princess from the clutches of an evil minister in the enchanting Pumpkin Kingdom.

Lastly, in "Precure and Refi's Wonder Night!," the Precure team joins forces with Princess Refi to restore daylight in a kingdom perpetually shrouded in night, battling against the sinister Night Pumpkin. This part also showcases the remarkable singing talent of Hinata Uegaki in her debut voice-acting role as Princess Refi.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
